name: part_010
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive Indonesia Generasi 1 Bernyanyi Bersama #Area15Mini3DLive [oY0HSWOqV0s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: The members of Hololive Indonesia Generation 1 introduce and promote their 3D Debut Celebration merchandise, including mascot plushies.
The atmosphere turns emotional as the members reflect on their journey and thank the fans for two years of support.

subtitles.original: Waduh, ini keren banget!
subtitles.english: Wow, this is so cool!

subtitles.original: Tapi...
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: Tapi gak cuma ini lho.
subtitles.english: But it's not just this.

subtitles.original: Oh, ada lagi?
subtitles.english: Oh, there's more?

subtitles.original: Not just this, we have another one!
subtitles.english: Not just this, we have another one!

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: What is it?
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: Apa lagi nih?
subtitles.english: What else is there?

subtitles.original: Jyan jyan jyan!
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Jadi temen-temen...
subtitles.english: So, friends...

subtitles.original: There are three special items.
subtitles.english: There are three special items.

subtitles.original: "Everyone's Best Friends, Risusaurus" - Plushie
subtitles.english: "Everyone's Best Friends, Risusaurus" - Plushie

subtitles.original: And "My Bestfriend Moomo" - Plushie
subtitles.english: And "My Bestfriend Moomo" - Plushie

subtitles.english: And "Kyawaii Chiyopi" - Plushie

subtitles.original: Let's go, let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: Ah, ini dia! Look at this!
subtitles.english: Ah, here it is! Look at this!

subtitles.original: Ini kecilnya segini lho.
subtitles.english: It's about this small.

subtitles.original: Jadi nih, size aslinya tuh seperti ini.
subtitles.english: So, this is its actual size.

subtitles.original: So this is the real size of it.
subtitles.english: So this is the real size of it.

subtitles.original: You can see the size on the screen, right?
subtitles.english: You can see the size on the screen, right?

subtitles.original: So there's a reason why we show this on our 3D showcase.
subtitles.english: So there's a reason why we show this on our 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: Because we want to let you know how cute our plushie is.
subtitles.english: Because we want to let you know how cute our plushie is.

subtitles.original: And this is Chiyopi, this is Yopi.
subtitles.english: And this is Chiyopi, this is Yopi.

subtitles.original: This is Yopi.
subtitles.english: This is Yopi.

subtitles.original: Ah, this is Yopi!
subtitles.english: Ah, this is Yopi!

subtitles.original: This is Yopi!
subtitles.english: This is Yopi!

subtitles.original: This is Yopi!
subtitles.english: This is Yopi!

subtitles.original: Ini gak tau siapa.
subtitles.english: I don't know who this is.

subtitles.original: This is alien!
subtitles.english: This is an alien!

subtitles.original: This is Chiyopi, this is Yopi.
subtitles.english: This is Chiyopi, this is Yopi.

subtitles.original: Chiyopi is small, Yopi is big.
subtitles.english: Chiyopi is small, Yopi is big.

subtitles.original: Yopi!
subtitles.english: Yopi!

subtitles.original: Don't forget to buy it, it's on sale starting from September 20th!
subtitles.english: Don't forget to buy it, it's on sale starting from September 20th!

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: Cekidot!
subtitles.english: Check it out!

subtitles.original: Please buy it because it's so cute.
subtitles.english: Please buy it because it's so cute.

subtitles.original: If you also, this is like a version of a plain one...
subtitles.english: If you also, this is like a version of a plain one...

subtitles.original: You can add glasses to it as well!
subtitles.english: You can add glasses to it as well!

subtitles.original: You can buy the glasses by yourself.
subtitles.english: You can buy the glasses by yourself.

subtitles.original: And also this Risusaurus, it's actually Risu in a dinosaur pajamas.
subtitles.english: And also this Risusaurus, it's actually Risu in a dinosaur pajamas.

subtitles.original: So this is basically mini Risu just like Chiyopi.
subtitles.english: So this is basically mini Risu just like Chiyopi.

subtitles.original: Yes! Chiyopi!
subtitles.english: Yes! Chiyopi!

subtitles.original: Big Yopi!
subtitles.english: Big Yopi!

subtitles.original: Chiyopi!
subtitles.english: Chiyopi!

subtitles.original: Risu! Risusaurus!
subtitles.english: Risu! Risusaurus!

subtitles.original: And Moomo!
subtitles.english: And Moomo!

subtitles.original: Biar deket di hati guys.
subtitles.english: To stay close to your heart, guys.

subtitles.original: Waduh, ini Chiyopi gak ekstrim gitu kan?
subtitles.english: Wow, this Chiyopi isn't extreme, right?

subtitles.original: Aduh ada ini, waduh cium-cium. Wangi-wangi!
subtitles.english: Oh, there's this. Give it a kiss. Smells good!

subtitles.original: So if you are really interested, you need to buy it.
subtitles.english: So if you are really interested, you need to buy it.

subtitles.original: We've been waiting for 17 months...
subtitles.english: We've been waiting for 17 months...

subtitles.original: To actually release this, so please buy it, make it sold out.
subtitles.english: To actually release this, so please buy it, make it sold out.

subtitles.original: You can check on the link, usually it's in Hololive Indonesia Twitter.
subtitles.english: You can check on the link, usually it's in Hololive Indonesia Twitter.

subtitles.original: You can check in the website and also in the description of the video.
subtitles.english: You can check in the website and also in the description of the video.

subtitles.original: Please buy it! Buy five for your family, okay?
subtitles.english: Please buy it! Buy five for your family, okay?

subtitles.original: Who love your wife, who love your kids, buy!
subtitles.english: Who love your wife, who love your kids, buy!

subtitles.original: Sayang anak, sayang istri, beli! Sayang waifu!
subtitles.english: Love your kids, love your wife, buy! Love your waifu!

subtitles.original: Betul teman-teman.
subtitles.english: That's right, friends.

subtitles.original: Aduh, udah disayang seperti anak sendiri.
subtitles.english: Oh, it's already loved like my own child.

subtitles.original: Terus, kita kan udah promosi, udah nyanyi, udah ngelawak.
subtitles.english: And now, we've promoted, sung, and joked around.

subtitles.original: Kita ngomong yang agak berat-berat dulu kali ya?
subtitles.english: Should we talk about something more serious now?

subtitles.original: Ini mau disimpan dulu nggak?
subtitles.english: Should we put these away first?

subtitles.original: Terima kasih, thank you so much.
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: Aduh ada yang nangis-nangis ya, bentar.
subtitles.english: Oh, someone's crying, wait a second.

subtitles.original: Aku tuh di aslinya tuh aku gak nangis, kalian sih!
subtitles.english: I wasn't actually crying in real life. It's because of you guys!

subtitles.original: Itu ya teman-teman, karena ini tuh adalah...
subtitles.english: That's it, friends, because this is...

subtitles.original: Karena ini tuh live kita bertiga...
subtitles.english: Because this is our live session as a trio...

subtitles.original: Terima kasih atas dukungannya sejauh ini.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for the support up until now.

subtitles.original: Kita udah 2 tahun lebih ya teman-teman.
subtitles.english: It's been over two years already, friends.

subtitles.original: Semoga ini adalah awal untuk Hololive Indonesia...
subtitles.english: I hope this is just the beginning for Hololive Indonesia...

subtitles.original: Supaya bisa lebih berkembang lagi teman-teman.
subtitles.english: So it can grow even more, friends.

subtitles.original: Ingat ini cuman Mini 3D Live...
subtitles.english: Remember, this is just a Mini 3D Live...

subtitles.original: Semoga kita bisa mendapatkan live yang benar-benar live.
subtitles.english: But I hope we can have a real full-scale live concert.

subtitles.original: Terus setelah kita...
subtitles.english: And after us...

subtitles.original: Kita juga berharap untuk gen-gen yang selanjutnya.
subtitles.english: We also have high hopes for the next generations.

subtitles.original: Kita tunggu di panggung yang selama ini kita impi-impikan.
subtitles.english: We'll wait for you on the stage we've been dreaming of.

subtitles.original: Jadi semangat, ditunggu gen selanjutnya. Oke?
subtitles.english: So keep up the spirit, we're waiting for the next gen. Okay?

subtitles.original: Terus dari kalian nih, aduh.
subtitles.english: And from you guys... oh.

subtitles.original: Mau nangis.
subtitles.english: I'm going to cry.
